item.title: [Python] Draw gears
item.description: Gears are cool, aren't they? I feel that I can look at any number of movements of a clock that works in conjunction with various large and small gears. Article purpose I will draw a gear by programming. There are various types of gears, but we will try focusing on ** spur gears **. This is the type of gear that the general public first think of when they hear a gear, as in the image above.
